member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView
member.summary: Represents the <View> element used for SharePoint data retrieval configuration. Only certain configuration options are made available. The class is version independent and each SharePoint service implementation may process it differently.
member.remarks: The class will likely extend in the future.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.Attributes
member.summary: Provides access to the collection of <View> element attributes. Attributes which are not contained in the collection have their default meaning. Access to some attributes is provided via short hand properties.
member.remarks: For informational list of possible attributes see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/office/ms438338(v=office.14).aspx Please note that the actual recognized attributes are service type and version dependent and each implementing may handle them differently.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.Scope
member.summary: Gets or sets the Scope attribute value. Null value removes the attribute (keeping it default). Typical values are FilesOnly (show only the files of a specific folder), Recursive (show all files of all folders) or RecursiveAll (show all files and all subfolders of all folders). The default lists only files and subfolders of a specific folder.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.QueryInnerXml
member.summary: The inner XML of <Query> element.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.ViewFields
member.summary: List of view fields (fields that will be retrieved from the server; some system fields are always retrieved).

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView.RowLimit
member.summary: Specifies the limit of rows retrieved from SharePoint server. Non-positive values mean no limit.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointFile
member.summary: Represents version independent SharePoint file. The file or its properties may be loaded eagerly or lazily (depends on implementation).

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointFile.GetContentBytes
member.summary: Gets the file's content as an array of bytes.
member.returns: Array of bytes containing SharePoint file's binary data
member.exception: Thrown when requested file is not present at SharePoint server.
Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown when identity client library "msoidcliL.dll" needed for SharePoint Online authentication is missing. See documentation for details.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointListService.GetListItems(System.String,System.String,CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView,CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection)

summary.para: Gets (optionally) a selection of list items of SharePoint list identified by its title. Keeping listItemsSelection.FieldName or listItemsSelection.FieldType unspecified causes all items (optionally restricted by camlQueryString) to be selected. Keeping camlQueryString unspecified causes all list items to be selected (the listItemsSelection still applies).

The listItemsSelection parameter is provided just for comfortability reason and the same can be achieved using
<Query> <And> camlQueryString <Eq><FieldRef Name="" /><Value Type=""></Value></Eq> </And> </Query>
The DataSet has an empty table (with no columns) if no list items are retrieved.

member.param: Relative URL of listed folder (if list supports subfolders). Keep blank for root listing.
Configuration options for list items retrieval.
Constraint for selection of certain items.
member.returns: DataSet containing DataTable with list items.
member.exception: Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown when identity client library "msoidcliL.dll" needed for SharePoint Online authentication is missing. See documentation for details.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.
member.remarks: The value of parameter folderServerRelativeUrl can originate from FileRef column of parent folder items listing. To determine whether an item is a folder, check the FSObjType column's value equality to 1.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointSiteService
member.summary: Provides access to information about SharePoint site.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.ISharePointSiteService.GetSiteUrl
member.summary: Gets SharePoint site URL.
member.returns: SharePoint site URL.
member.exception: Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown when identity client library "msoidcliL.dll" needed for SharePoint Online authentication is missing. See documentation for details.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

summary.para:
Holds a triplet for list items selection specification. The triplet is semantically equivalent to following SharePoint Query expression
<FieldRef Name="FieldName" /><Value Type="FieldType">FieldValue</Value>
In order for the selection to be valid the , and should be provided.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new list items selection with no parameters.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new list items selection with selection parameters specified.
member.param: Field name (internal name) on which to perform selection.
Field type on which the selection is performed.
Field value which is looked up in the list.

member.summary: Field name (internal name) on which to perform selection.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection.FieldType
member.summary: Field type on which the selection is performed.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection.FieldValue
member.summary: Field value which is looked up in the list.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointViewScope
member.summary: Contains well-known constants specifying the recursive scope of a SharePoint library.

member.name: F:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointViewScope.DEFAULT
member.summary: Show only the files and subfolders of a specific folder.

member.name: F:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointViewScope.FILES_ONLY
member.summary: Show only the files of a specific folder.

member.name: F:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointViewScope.RECURSIVE_ALL
member.summary: Show all files and all subfolders of all folders.

member.name: F:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointViewScope.RECURSIVE
member.summary: Show only the files of a specific folder.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder
member.summary: Helps building Collaborative Application Markup Language (CAML) queries.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.GetViewXmlAsString(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets CAML suitable for property (including <View> element).
member.returns: View XML.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.GetItemSelectionXml
member.summary: Gets CAML for item selection. Something like <Eq><FieldRef Name="ItemSelectionFieldName" /><Value Type="ItemSelectionFieldType">ItemSelectionFieldValue</Value></Eq>
member.returns: CAML for item selection, or null if , or are not provided.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.CreateViewDocument(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new document with <View> as a root and optionally with attributes.
member.returns: Document with View element and its attributes

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new CAML query builder.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.QueryInnerXml
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner XML of CAML Query element.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.Query
member.summary: Gets the CAML Query root element.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.RowLimit
member.summary: Specifies the limit of rows retrieved from SharePoint server. Non-positive values mean no limit.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.ViewFields
member.summary: List containing field names to be retrieved from SharePoint server. The SharePoint internal names must be used. Keeping null causes all fields to be retrieved.

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.ItemSelectionFieldName
member.summary:
Field name (internal name) for selection of certain item(s) in which the is being searched (using equality operator). The field is usually some unique field but it is not a must. The selection is made from elements satisfying the . The selection part of query will look like the following
<Eq><FieldRef Name="ItemSelectionFieldName" /><Value Type="ItemSelectionFieldType">ItemSelectionFieldValue</Value></Eq>

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.ItemSelectionFieldType
member.summary: Type of field specified in for selection of certain item(s).

member.name: P:CMS.SharePoint.CamlQueryBuilder.ItemSelectionFieldValue
member.summary:
Searched value of for selection of certain item(s). The selection is made from elements satisfying the . The selection part of query will look like the following
<Eq><FieldRef Name="ItemSelectionFieldName" /><Value Type="ItemSelectionFieldType">ItemSelectionFieldValue</Value></Eq>

Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointAbstractService
member.summary: Privdes common methods suitable for all SharePoint services.

member.name: F:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointAbstractService.SHAREPOINT_CCSDK_IDCRL_LIB
member.summary: Identity client runtime library name. Needed for SharePoint Online connectivity if SharePointOnlineCredentials are being used.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointAbstractService.IsConnectionSupported
member.summary: Tells you whether provided ConnectionData can be used (eg. the authentication mode is supported and site URL is in correct format).
member.returns: True if ConnectionData can be used by this implementation, false otherwise.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointAbstractService.CreateClientContext
member.summary: Create a new ClientContext for SharePoint 2010 based on ConnectionData.
member.returns: ClientContext
member.exception: Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown when identity client library "msoidcliL.dll" needed for SharePoint Online authentication is missing. See documentation for details.
member.remarks: If you encounter problems regarding the missing library "msoidcliL.dll", make sure the SharePoint Client Components SDK is installed.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePointAbstractService.ExecuteQuery(Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ClientContext)
member.summary: Executes query on SharePoint server. Serves as an adapter for different versions.
member.param: Client context on which to perform query execution.
member.exception: Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.summary: Creates a new SharePoint 2010 ISharePointFileService

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010FileService.GetFile(System.String)
member.summary: Gets SharePoint file identified by server relative URL. The file may be loaded lazily. In such case an invalid serverRelativeUrl is not reported immediately.
member.returns: SharePoint file, or null
member.exception: Thrown when requested file is not present at SharePoint server (and eager loading is used).
Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: T:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService
member.summary: Provides access to SharePoint lists.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService.#ctor(CMS.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionData)
member.summary: Creates a new SharePoint 2010 ISharePointListService

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService.GetLists(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all lists on SharePoint server. The DataSet has an empty table (with no columns) if no lists are retrieved. Includes only public properties of value type (not Nullable) or string type.
member.param: Specifies whether to list only lists of certain type.
member.returns: DataSet containing DataTable with all lists.
member.exception: Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService.GetListItems(System.String,System.String,CMS.SharePoint.SharePointView,CMS.SharePoint.SharePointListItemsSelection)

summary.para: Gets (optionally) a selection of list items of SharePoint list identified by its title. Keeping listItemsSelection.FieldName, listItemsSelection.FieldType or listItemsSelection.FieldValue unspecified causes all items (optionally restricted by camlQueryString) to be selected. Keeping camlQueryString unspecified causes all list items to be selected (the listItemsSelection still applies).

The listItemsSelection parameter is provided just for comfortability reason and the same can be achieved using as follows
<Query> <And> camlQueryString <Eq><FieldRef Name="" /><Value Type=""></Value></Eq> </And> </Query>
The DataSet has an empty table (with no columns) if no list items are retrieved.

member.param: Relative URL of listed folder (if list supports subfolders). Keep blank for root listing.
Configuration options for list items retrieval.
Constraint for selection of certain items.
member.returns: DataSet containing DataTable with list items.
member.exception: Thrown whenever server error occurs.
Thrown when error related to network or protocol occurs.
Thrown when given connectionData contains unsupported authentication mode or invalid URL.
Thrown in case of unexpected error condition.
member.remarks: The value of parameter folderServerRelativeUrl can originate from FileRef column of parent folder items listing. To determine whether an item is a folder, check the FSObjType column's value equality to 1.

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService.ListItemCollectionToDataTable(Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.ListItemCollection)
member.summary: Converts ListItemCollection to DataTable. Returns empty DataTable if ListItemCollection contains no items.
member.returns: DataTable containing all items, or empty one if zero items provided

member.name: M:CMS.SharePoint.SharePoint2010ListService.ListCollectionToDataTable(System.Collections.Generic.IList{Microsoft.SharePoint.Client.List})
member.summary: Converts ListCollection to DataTable. Returns empty DataTable if ListCollection contains no items. Includes only public properties of value type (not Nullable) or string type.
member.returns: DataTable containing all lists, or empty one if zero items provided
